title: cant log in
body: I cant log into the game now...... its been an hour and still cant log in anyone know a fix????

replies.body: Aye,  Cox is having some service issues for some folks in areas around Arizona.  I don't have further news to share now, but I'll let you know if anything comes my way.  In the meantime, hopefully your ISP's support site is keeping your area up to date on the issue as well.  Otherwise, hang tight until then!
exactly my issue just read that its only happening to cox communication customers that live in arizona :/ sucks to be us xD
My client is just stuck on "Authenticating...", can't login. :(
